Interface Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilterAction, TextAction

    public interface Action
    Parser action.

      String run(Map<String,Filter.Handler> filters, Map<String,String> args)
      Called during template run to expand given action.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        String run(Map<String,Filter.Handler> filters,
           Map<String,String> args)
    throws LuigiError
        Called during template run to expand given action.
        Parameters:
        filters - Template filters.
        filters - Run argument map.
        Returns:
        Action result.
        Throws:
        LuigiError - If an error occurs while running this action.
